title: Removing accounts on the latest version of the desktop app
content: Hello, I'll try to be as calm as possible. Where is that "remove account"? I can't for the life of me find it or any other way to remove an account from the app. Can you help me?
creator: ntinoschan6

title: Waar blijven mijn "verzonden berichten"/"sent items
content: Ik kan helaas niet achterhalen sinds wanneer maar als ik een email verzend of beantwoord, wordt er (in ieder geval sinds maanden) geen kopie in "Sent items" geplaatst. Wat is er aan de hand??
creator: peter894

title: Storing Local folder on a different drive
content:
I am looking to create a local folder where I can archive my emails to a different drive. Lets call that drive D: for now. I want to setup in "Local Folders" A folder called "Archive" and I want that to reside on the D: Drive But want to keep my email accounts that all emails come into initially on the C: drive till I move the emails to the "Archive" folder that is on the D: drive. How do I do that? It does not seem to allow me to change the location of the folders in "Local Folders" When i create one.

Any help, Helps... Thank you
creator: petzany

title: Thunderbird does not play nice with outlook.
content:
Hello all, i am as new as it comes to thunderbird, this program seemed nice, and simple for me to use and less "clutter" than other mail clients.

however i have a problem where i dont recive any mails at all? and i cant seem to use the phone app ither, i have tried to send myself a few mails and none of them has gone trough? I am a windows user and i find no info on how to fix this, i have done the server stuff and yet no change. 

can someone please help me?

the most common error message i get is "User is Authenticated but not Connected" how that works is out of my mind? but i cant seem to make it go past this error message...
creator: acillabibo

title: Thunderbird keeps freezing and  uppdate not working
content: bold text Thunderbird not working correctly i try to get the latest update and it says failed and or just keeps spinning. or i get Thunderbird is running every time i click on the icon what wrong with it. or it keeps saying Thunderbird is running and it is not is it me or is it Thunderbird i do not understand it was running ok before the new Windows update. please help
creator: mdm54

title: see now this is what  i get wht is going on
content: please tell me it is not me i love Thunderbird but this is happening this is maddening '
